title: Meet the director behind some of UK rap’s best music videos
text:
He’s been behind the camera for Dave’s ‘Question Time’, ‘No Words’, ’Funky Friday’, ‘Black’ and ‘Streatham’, helping shape the Mercury Prize winner’s visual output for the past couple of years.

But Nathan James Tettey almost wasn’t a music video director.

It was only when the original director for ‘Question Time’ realised they were double booked that Tettey – who commissioned the film – decided to step in and direct the thing himself.

As part of 1Xtra’s Black History Month Visual Histories, the fledging talent told us about his story.
description: Nathan James Tettey only started making videos in 2017 – now he’s one of the leading names
